name: Shockwave
effect: Talent: Protection

Ferocity

effect: When this ally enters play, target hero or ally you control has Long-Range this turn.

name: The Crucible of Carnage: The Twilight Terror
effect:
On your turn, if an ability, ally, or equipment was destroyed this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Maw of Iso'rath
effect:
If three or more allies you controlled dealt damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card.

name: The Worldbreaker
effect:
Pay 8 and turn all other quests you control named The Worldbreaker face down to complete this quest.
Reward: Your hero has Assault 5 and [Fire] ATK this turn, plus an additional Assault 5 this turn for each other quest turned face down this way.

name: Thrall, Guardian of the Elements
effect:
You pay 8 less to play this ally if you control each of the following: [Fire] card, [Frost] card, [Melee] card, and [Nature] card.
Other abilities, allies, and equipment you control can't be destroyed.

name: Wild Growth
effect: Talent: Restoration

Restoration Talent (You can't put Balance Talents or Feral Talents in your deck.)

Ongoing: Your hero has Mend 1 for each growth counter on this ability.Talent: Restoration
